author: lu4242
msg: Move tomahawk converters and validators to myfaces-commons part 1(and update stuff to 1.2 version), add example submodule.

author: kclark
msg: rb: Switch NonblockingServer spec from Queue to sleep
Using sleep instead of Queue#pop means the thread is killable under JRuby

author: kclark
msg: rb: NonblockingServer: Use a select() loop in the acceptor thread
Using a select() loop with a timeout allows the acceptor thread to be shut down

author: kclark
msg: rb: Set default host for benchmark to 127.0.0.1
MRI resolves localhost to ::1 (on OS X) whereas JRuby resolves it to 127.0.0.1. This means using
MRI for server and JRuby for client doesn't work.
